thread.section_title: fios.verizon.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of fios.verizon.com | fios.verizon.com
thread.title: Melanie

author: Melanie
title: Melanie
text: Kelly went above and beyond to make sure I was fully aware of all the products and services, and was fully committed to making sure that I could save money. I had an awful experience with TWC and I called Verizon to see what they could offer. I DID NOT expect to be setting up installation and services from that phone call. But Kelly did everything she could to make sure I was taken care of and it's because of her that I signed up for Verizon fios :). They need more Kelly's in the world
